message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and your appreciation for it, I propose a price of $10000. This offer includes a limited-time discount, making it an attractive opportunity for you.
I appreciate the discount, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of this, I'd like to extend a special offer of $9500 for the product. This is a favorable price considering the value it brings to you, while also allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate the effort to find a mutually beneficial agreement, but I'm still a bit above $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9250. Can we discuss this further?

Bob, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. Considering your offer, I am proposing a price of $9375 for the product. This is a fair compromise, taking into account both the value of the product and your budget. I hope this meets your expectations.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $9375. I'm willing to meet you at $9200. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thank you for your final offer. I appreciate your commitment to reaching an agreement. In response, I would like to suggest a price of $9250 for the product. This is the highest I can go, considering the value it offers. I hope this proposal works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $9250, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to go up to $9150, but no further. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thank you for your final offer. After careful consideration, I am proposing a price of $9200 for the product. This is the highest I can go, given the value it brings. I hope this offer is acceptable and allows us to reach an agreement.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I'm willing to accept your offer of $9200. I think this is a fair price for the product, and I'm excited to move forward with the purchase.
